event.title: Apple WWDC 2018 - Keynote
event.description:
• What we'll do
Tune in and watch the Apple WWDC keynote and enjoy conversation, food and drinks with fellow SWmobile members.

In time-honoured tradition we'll retire to a local pub to digest the announcements and the first drink is on us (thanks again to our generous sponsors).

• What to bring
Yourselves, your best Apple rumours & buzzword bingo cards.

• Important to know
The keynote starts at 6pm which is a little earlier than our usual Meetups, with doors opening at 5:30pm. Also worth noting that the keynote is on a Monday not a Tuesday! RSVPs will close 4pm Friday 1st June so we can confirm attendees with the building security.
